    Function reference

    All functions

    ippuc_neigh
    Neighborhood Boundaries Data for Curitiba
    ippuc_road_axis
    Road Data for Curitiba
    nds_calc_dist()
    Calculate traveled distance from the naturalistic data
    nds_calc_speeding()
    Calculate speeding rate from the naturalistic data
    nds_calc_time()
    Calculate traveled time from the naturalistic data
    nds_create_lines()
    Create a sf object using the linestring geometry
    nds_create_points()
    Create a sf object with point geometry
    nds_download_cwb_osm()
    Download OSM data for Curitiba, Brazil
    nds_download_sf()
    Download spatial data
    nds_join_axis()
    Join NDS data with road axis data
    nds_join_neigh()
    Join NDS data with neighborhood data
    nds_join_spdlimit()
    Join NDS data with OSM speed limit data
    nds_load_data()
    Load naturalistic data stored in .csv files
    nds_split_data()
    Split naturalistic data into the original files
    ndsbr_data_sf
    Example NDS-BR Spatial Dataset
    ndsdrivers
    NDS-BR participants data
    osm_data
    OSM Road Network Data for Curitiba
